name: Galaxy F13
hightlight: Samsung Galaxy F13 comes with 6.6 inches Full HD+ PLS LCD screen. It has a waterdrop notch front camera design. The back camera is of triple 50+5+2 with PDAF, f/1.8 aperture, ultrawide, depth sensor, LED flash etc. and Full HD video recording. The front camera is of 8 MP. Galaxy F13 comes with 6000 mAh battery with 15W fast charging. It has 4 or 6 GB RAM, up to 2.0 GHz octa-core CPU and Mali-G52 GPU. It is powered by a Exynos 850 (8 nm) chipset. The device comes with 64 or 128 GB internal storage and dedicated MicroSD slot. There is a side-mounted fingerprint sensor in this phone.
descriptions: Samsung Galaxy F13 comes with 6.6 inches Full HD+ PLS LCD screen. It has a waterdrop notch front camera design. The back camera is of triple 50+5+2 with PDAF, f/1.8 aperture, ultrawide, depth sensor, LED flash etc. and Full HD video recording. The front camera is of 8 MP. Galaxy F13 comes with 6000 mAh battery with 15W fast charging. It has 4 or 6 GB RAM, up to 2.0 GHz octa-core CPU and Mali-G52 GPU. It is powered by a Exynos 850 (8 nm) chipset. The device comes with 64 or 128 GB internal storage and dedicated MicroSD slot. There is a side-mounted fingerprint sensor in this phone.

name: Galaxy Tab A (2019)
hightlight: Discover a practical companion in Galaxy Tab A (8.0'', 2019), a tablet that excels at the basics and adds a lot more.With a design that’s easy to carry with one hand, it's slim, compact, and portable, the ideal blend of performance, design and attainability.
descriptions: Samsung Galaxy Tab A Plus (2019) is releasing latest tablets in the first quater. Galaxy launch in Tablet series by Samsung in the month of March 2019. The smartphone has Samsung Exynos 7 Octa 7904 Processor.The tablet runs on Android 8.1 Oreo and the dimension is 201.5 x 122.4 x 8.9 mm that weighs 325 Grams (With Battery).Talking camera into consideration, the smartphone has 13 Megapixel Rear camera with LED Flash along with 8 Megapixel Front camera.

name: Walton Primo N4
hightlight: Walton Primo N4 comes with 6.5 inches HD+ IPS INCELL screen. It has a full-view waterdrop notch design. The back camera is of triple 16+8+2 MP with PDAF, 120º ultrawide, depth sensor, LED flash etc. The front camera is of 13 MP. Primo N4 comes with 4000 mAh battery. It has3 or 4 GB RAM, 2.0 GHz octa-core CPU and Mali-G71 MP2 GPU. It is powered by a MediaTek (unspecified) chipset. The device comes with 32 or 64 GB internal storage and dedicatedMicroSD slot. There is a back-mounted fingerprint sensor in this phone.
descriptions: Walton Primo N4 comes with 6.5 inches HD+ IPS INCELL screen. It has a full-view waterdrop notch design. The back camera is of triple 16+8+2 MP with PDAF, 120º ultrawide, depth sensor, LED flash etc. The front camera is of 13 MP. Primo N4 comes with 4000 mAh battery. It has3 or 4 GB RAM, 2.0 GHz octa-core CPU and Mali-G71 MP2 GPU. It is powered by a MediaTek (unspecified) chipset. The device comes with 32 or 64 GB internal storage and dedicatedMicroSD slot. There is a back-mounted fingerprint sensor in this phone.

name: Walton Primo HM5
hightlight: The company Announced Walton Primo HM5 in 21 July 2020 and Released in 28 July 2020. The mobile is available in 3 colors in the market. The colors are Breathing Midnight Cyan, Black & Purple.
descriptions: This phone has been Stared 8,599 Taka Price in Bangladesh. Considering the budget, I hope it will be a great phone.

name: Apple iPad Air 16GB Wifi+Cellular
hightlight: Presenting the brand new iPad Air, unbelievably thin and light yet packs so much more power and capabilities than ever before. Featuring the latest A7 chip, advanced wireless, and great apps for your entertainment, productivity and creativity – all beautifully integrated with the iOS 7.
descriptions: Through a series of vigorous refinements, Apple has managed to drop the iPad Air’s volume close to a quarter of the volume of the previous generation iPad. However, when you hold the iPad Air for the first time in your hands, you will feel how durable and elegantly designed it is. The unibody construction provides amazing strength and simplifies the enclosure which the results is an iPad that not feels amazing to hold but is also easy to take around with you no matter where you go.

name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max
hightlight: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max comes with a 6.7 inches LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED 1290 x 2796 pixels screen. It has a double punch-hole design. The back camera is of quad 48+12+12 Megapixel + TOF 3D LiDAR scanner with powerful image processing capability and 4K video recording. The front one is of Dual 12 MP and SL 3D camera. Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max comes with – mAh battery with – fast charging solution. It has 6 GB RAM, up to 3.46 GHz Hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU. It is powered by a 4 nm Apple A16 Bionic chipset. The device comes with 128, 256, 512 GB or 1 TB internal storage.
descriptions: Among other features, there is Face ID, Apple Pay, Siri, Qi Wireless Charging, Emergency SOS via satellite etc. There is no FM Radio, 3.5mm jack and MicroSD slot in this phone. The device is IP68 certified waterproof and 5G supported.

name: Apple iPhone 13 Mini
hightlight: Apple iPhone 13 Mini comes with a 5.4 inches Super Retina XDR OLED Full HD+ screen. It has a classical Apple iPhone notch design. The back camera is of dual 12+12 MP with powerful image processing capability and 4K video recording. The front one is of Dual 12 MP and SL 3D camera. Apple iPhone 13 Mini comes with 2438 mAh battery with 20W fast charging solution. It has 4 GB RAM, up to 3.22 GHz Hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU. It is powered by a 5 nm Apple A15 Bionic chipset. The device comes with 128, 256 or 512 GB internal storage.
descriptions: Among other features, there is Face ID, Apple Pay, Siri, Qi Wireless Charging etc. There is no FM Radio, 3.5mm jack and MicroSD slot in this phone. The device is IP68 certified waterproof and 5G supported.

name: Apple iPhone SE 2020
hightlight: Apple iPhone SE 2020 comes with 4.7 inches 750 x 1334 pixels Retina IPS LCD screen. It has a classic Apple iPhone design. The back camera is of single 12 MP with PDAF, dual-LED flash, HDR, OIS etc. and Ultra HD 4K video recording. The front camera is of 7 MP. iPhone SE 2020 comes with 1821 mAh battery. It has 3 GB RAM and up to 2.65 GHz hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU (4-core graphics). It is powered by Apple A13 Bionic (7 nm+) chipset. The device comes with 64, 128 or 256 GB internal storage. There is a front-mounted fingerprint sensor in this device.
descriptions: Among other features, there is Apple Pay, Siri, IP67 certified dust & waterproof body, true-tone display etc.

name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max
hightlight: Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max comes with a 6.7 inches Super Retina XDR OLED Full HD+ screen. It has a Apple iPhone notch design. The back camera is of quad 12+12+12 Megapixel + TOF 3D LiDAR scanner with powerful image processing capability and 4K video recording. The front one is of Dual 12 MP and SL 3D camera. Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max comes with 4352 mAh battery with 27W fast charging solution. It has 6 GB RAM, up to 3.22 GHz Hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU. It is powered by a 5 nm Apple A15 Bionic chipset. The device comes with 128, 256, 512 GB or 1 TB internal storage.
descriptions: Among other features, there is Face ID, Apple Pay, Siri, Qi Wireless Charging etc. There is no FM Radio, 3.5mm jack and MicroSD slot in this phone. The device is IP68 certified waterproof and 5G supported.

name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
hightlight: Apple iPhone 14 Pro comes with a 6.1 inches LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED 1179 x 2556 pixels screen. It has a double punch-hole design. The back camera is of quad 48+12+12 Megapixel + TOF 3D LiDAR scanner with powerful image processing capability and 4K video recording. The front one is of Dual 12 MP and SL 3D camera. Apple iPhone 14 Pro comes with – mAh battery with – fast charging solution. It has 6 GB RAM, up to 3.46 GHz Hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU. It is powered by a 4 nm Apple A16 Bionic chipset. The device comes with 128, 256, 512 GB or 1 TB internal storage.
descriptions: Among other features, there is Face ID, Apple Pay, Siri, Qi Wireless Charging, Emergency SOS via satellite etc. There is no FM Radio, 3.5mm jack and MicroSD slot in this phone. The device is IP68 certified waterproof and 5G supported.

name: Xiaomi 12 Pro
hightlight: Xiaomi 12 Pro comes with 6.73 inches Quad HD+ LTPO AMOLED screen. It has a Full-View center punch-hole design. The frontside is protected by a Gorilla Glass Victus. The back camera is of triple 50+50+50 MP with dual-Pixel PDAF, dual-LED flash, 115º ultrawide lens, telephoto camera, OIS, 2x optical zoom, 1/1.28″, 1.22µm, etc. and up to 8K video recording. The front camera is of 32 MP. Xiaomi 12 Pro comes with 4600 mAh battery with 120W Quick Charge 4+ fast charging and 50W Fast Wireless Charging options. It has 8 or 12 GB RAM, up to 3 GHz octa-core CPU and Adreno 730 GPU. It is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 (4 nm) chipset. The device comes in 128 or 256 GB UFS 3.1 internal storage and no Memory Card slot. There is an optical in-display fingerprint sensor in this phone.
descriptions: Among other features, there is Dual SIM, face unlock, USB Type-C, Infrared, NFC etc.

name: Xiaomi Mi Note 10 Lite
hightlight: Xiaomi Mi Note 10 Lite comes with 6.47 inches Full HD+ AMOLED screen. It has a Full-View waterdrop notch design. Both front and backside are protected by 5th generation Gorilla Glasses. The back camera is of quad 64+8+2+5 MP with PDAF, laser autofocus, quad-LED flash, ultrawide, dedicated macro camera, depth sensor etc. and UHD 4K video recording. The front camera is of 16 MP. Mi Note 10 Lite comes with 5260 mAh big battery with 30W fast charging. It has 6 or 8 GB RAM, up to 2.2 GHz octa-core CPU and Adreno 618 GPU. It is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 730G (8 nm) chipset. The device comes in 64 and 128 GB internal storage variants and no external Memory Card slot. There is an in-display fingerprint sensor in this phone.
descriptions: Among other features, there is Dual SIM, face unlock, USB Type-C, NFC etc.
